channel.title: My wireless connection
channel.description:
hey i have wireless connection and i made my own server and stuff....can i host it on the internet for other people to play on if i have a wireless connection...or do i have to go on my other computre (where the connection comes from) and host it on there???thanks for your time.
-elite

item.title: My wireless connection
item.dc:creator: @deidera deidera
item.description:
@deidera wrote:

UMM…if it’s on,IP is good everythings ready,they just go to moparscape>enter port>enter IP>log in.
You don’t need to host it anywhere,if the IP,port and all requirements are met then it’s on for other people.They just need to fill in the port and IP etc.

So,as long as you have everything running O.K,people can come.No hosting-you dont have to even be online while the server is online.

Read full topic
